text:
@realDonaldTrump How can you have a border dispute when, according to you  they don't share a border?
Also what makes you think you have the mental capacity to deal with this when you failed so miserably to understand Covid19 pandemic?
You are so out of your depth, it's ridiculous.
#DumbTrump https://t.co/NTTS26fqKj
